Package uk.ac.diamond.powder_toolkit.widgets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activator
    The activator class controls the plug-in life cycle, autogenerated
    ErrorWidget
    A widget designed to be used for error handling Currently very basic but this needs improving and implementing throughout program
    Properties_Widget
    Creates properties widgets for the indexing view, that can be used to input parameters to indexing algorithms
